description: Xingqiu è il giovane maestro della Guhua Clan di Liyue. Eccelle nel supporto Hydro off-field tramite il suo Elemental Burst, fornendo applicazione Hydro consistente e danno.
info: Xingqiu è uno dei migliori sub-DPS Hydro del gioco. Il suo Elemental Burst fornisce applicazione Hydro consistente e danno off-field. Priorità a Energy Recharge per uptime costante.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Guhua Style
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Fatal Rainscreen
skills.desc: Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.
skills.details_html:
Fatal Rainscreen
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.

skills.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
skills.desc: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.
skills.details_html:
Guhua Sword: Raincutter
Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.

passive_talents.name: Flash of Genius
passive_talents.desc: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

passive_talents.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passive_talents.desc: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
passive_talents.desc: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.desc: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s. Decreases the Hydro RES of enemies hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.desc: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Fatal Rainscreen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.desc: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.
